Action.author: ashcherbakov
Action.body: This looks like already fixed in INDY-1152

Action.author: ashcherbakov
Action.body: We need to Upgrade the pool and validate whether the issue has gone.

Action.author: mgbailey
Action.body: ~ashcherbakov , I don't see INDY-1152 in the release notes for 1.3.55, so I don't think it will be fixed in this upgrade, will it?

Action.author: ashcherbakov
Action.body: ~mgbailey It's fixed in the latest stable 1.3.55. Probably it was forgotten to add it into the release notes...

Action.author: ashcherbakov
Action.body: We can reopen any that reappear, but all is good on the live pool now.
